title: Tarzan, the ape man
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and W S. Van Dyke
brief_description: Tarzan, a man raised from childhood by apes, meets Jane, a young English woman on safari with her father. Based on the characters created by Edgar Rice Burroughs. Cast includes Johnny Weissmuller, Neil Hamilton, C. Aubrey Smith, Maureen o’Sullivan.
